Load the tideverse package
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

## 1. Load the fish data
```{r}
fish_data <- read_csv("data/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
```
## 2. Transform fish data to only include the variables lakeid and length
```{r}
fish_length <- select(fish_data, "lakeid", "length")
## select pulls out columns
```

## 3. Filter the fish data to include samples from lake "BO"
```{r}
glimpse(fish_data)
```

```{r}
only_bo <- filter(fish_data, lakeid == "BO")
only_bo
```

## 4. Calculate the mean length from lake BO
```{r}
mean(only_bo$length)
```

## Example from class
```{r}
fish_bo <- filter(fish_data, lakeid == "BO")
## filter looks within the observations and pulls out the conditions that match the observations
```

```{r}
mean(fish_bo$length)
```
